description: This module provides two services by default server.publicfiles[.instance] that serves files from public directory and a service server.resourcedirectory[.instance] which provides access to the underlying file system storage component. 'instance' parameter can be used to create multiple copies of the module

params.files: Config providing mapping of filename, internal path relative to storage directory, caching to be used for serving public files
params.filestoragedir: Directory where files to be served are stored
params.instance: Discriminator to distinguish multiple services created by multiple instances of the module
